perks.name: cheerleader
perks.label: Cheerleader
perks.description: Give up one of your actions to give all players within 5 squares 1 bonus dice to any 1 action.

perks.name: brawler
perks.label: Brawler
perks.description: Add two free bonus dice to any melee attack.

perks.name: builder
perks.label: Builder
perks.description: Barricades you build have 3d6 bonus health.

perks.name: doctor
perks.label: Doctor
perks.description: Healthkits you use restore an additional 2d6 health

perks.name: martial
perks.label: Martial Artist
perks.description: Add +1 to each defense dice you roll. Successful dodges allows you to automatically make a melee attack.

perks.name: sniper
perks.label: Sniper
perks.description: Add two free bonus dice to any ranged attacks.

perks.name: speedy
perks.label: speedy
perks.description: Move additional 2 spaces during a move action.
